SEARCH
Package com.framework.custom

Class CustomWebElement

java.lang.Object
com.framework.custom.CustomWebElement
public class CustomWebElement extends Object
Represents a custom web element in a web application. This class encapsulates details about a web element including its locator type, locator value, and a descriptive comment. It provides methods to manipulate and retrieve information about the web element, such as updating its properties, retrieving the underlying WebElement, and accessing its locator and comment.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomWebElement

      public CustomWebElement(Locators locatorType, String element, String comment)
      Constructor for creating a new CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      locatorType - The type of locator (ID, XPATH, CLASSNAME, CSS, TAGNAME, LINKTEXT).
      element - The locator value.
      comment - A comment or description for the web element.

  • Method Details

    • updateCustomWebElement

      public CustomWebElement updateCustomWebElement(String element, String comment)
      Updates the element and comment of this CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      element - The new locator value; if empty, the current value is retained.
      comment - The new comment; if empty, the current comment is retained.
      Returns:
      The updated CustomWebElement.

    • getElement

      public String getElement()
      Gets the locator value of this element.
      Returns:
      The locator value.

    • getWebElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getWebElement()
      Gets the WebElement based on the current locator.
      Returns:
      The WebElement found using the current locator.

    • getWebElements

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getWebElements()
      Gets a list of WebElements based on the current locator.
      Returns:
      A list of WebElements found using the current locator.

    • getComment

      public String getComment()
      Gets the comment or description of this element.
      Returns:

    • reloadWebElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement reloadWebElement()
      Reloads and returns the WebElement based on the current locator.
      Returns:
      The reloaded WebElement.

    • getByElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.By getByElement()
      Gets the By element based on the current locator. If the By element is null, it sets the By element based on the locator type.
      Returns:
      The By element.
